# Academisering
## Overzicht volgens aanbieding
### Tweede jaar
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(readxl)

data <- read_excel("Examenvragen-2.xlsx")
data %>% select(Nummer, Link, Vraag) %>%
knitr::kable() %>%
  kable_styling(fixed_thead = T, bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"), font_size = 10)
```

### Vierde jaar

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(readxl)
library(plyr)

data <- read_excel("Examenvragen-4.xlsx")
data %>% select(Nummer, Link, Vraag) %>%
knitr::kable() %>%
  kable_styling(fixed_thead = T, bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"), font_size = 10)
```

## Overzicht volgens thema
### Tweede jaar
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(readxl)
library(plyr)
data <- read_excel("Examenvragen-2.xlsx")
data %>% select(Cat, Link, Vraag, Nummer) %>%
plyr::arrange(Cat, Nummer) %>%
knitr::kable() %>%
  kable_styling(fixed_thead = T, bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"), font_size = 10)
```

### Vierde jaar 
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

```
